sentence.Network_en: The Navy is to carry out an examination of the wreck tomorrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 海军明天将对失事船只进行细查。

sentence.Network_en: The Turkish situation makes the lead in tomorrow's Guardian.
sentence.Network_cn: 土耳其局势将成为明天《卫报》的头条。

sentence.Network_en: Tomorrow night at sundown, the Jewish holiday of Passover begins.
sentence.Network_cn: 明天晚上太阳下山的时候，犹太人的逾越节便开始了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中昱字的解释 ... (1) 光辉灿烂的,明亮而闪闪发光的[ bright;sunlight;sunshine] (1) 明天[ tomorrow] 照耀[ shine].
&quot;未来&quot;用英语怎么说?_爱问知识人 ... futurity 将来，未来。（名词） tomorrow 未来，来日 （名词） by and by 不久，很快 …
摩尔电码 - 搜搜百科 ... TEMP - Temperature（ 气温） TMW - Tomorrow（ 明日（tomorrow）） TNX - Thanks（ 感谢）.
明字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 明确〖 pinpoint〗 明儿〖 tomorrow〗 明日〖 tomorrow〗.

list.abs: 新概念英语第二册学习笔记 ... ☆most of... 大多数的 ☆tomorrow evening: 明天晚上 ☆amusing adj. 好笑的，有趣的.
明日世界(TOMORROW LAND)的游乐设施主要有：飞越太空山（Space Mountain），也就是室内过山车，里面很暗代表漆黑的星际 …
没未来英文名什么意思?最好是缩写的_百度知道 ... desperation 绝望的境地 no tomorrow 没有明天 no future 没有未来.
四星口语复习词汇_百度文库 ... appointment 约会 tomorrow morning 明天早上 sometime 某时.
北京版《小学英语》词汇二 ... speak to 对…讲话... tomorrow morning 明天早晨... may v.可以.

phrase.cizu_name: as if there was (或 as though there were) no tomorr

jx.jx_en_mean: with no regard for the future consequences

lj.lj_ly: I ate as if there was no tomorrow.

jx.jx_en_mean: in the morning (or afternoon etc.) of tomorrow
used after a bad experience to express one's belief that the future will be better
jx.jx_cn_mean: 明天又是新的开始（不愉快经历之后所说的乐观话）
(英)从明天算起的一星期以后

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as two words): from the preposition to + morrow. Compare with today and tonight

entry.def: You use tomorrow to refer to the day after today.

example.ex: The first official results will be announced tomorrow.
example.tran: 第一批官方结果将于明天宣布。

example.ex: What's on your agenda for tomorrow?…
example.tran: 你明天的日程是怎么安排的？

example.ex: Davies plays for the Barbarians in tomorrow's match against England...
example.tran: 戴维斯将在明天对阵英格兰队的比赛中为野人队效力。

entry.tran: 在未来;(尤指)在不久的将来
entry.def: You can refer to the future, especially the near future, as tomorrow .

example.ex: What is education going to look like tomorrow?
example.tran: 未来的教育会是什么样子？

means.word_mean: 1. the next day, the day after, following the present day

auth_sentence.content: They need food to give to their families tomorrow.
auth_sentence.res_content: They need food to give to their families tomorrow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They need food to give to their families tomorrow.

auth_sentence.content: I'm looking forward to more GB medals tomorrow!
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm looking forward to more GB medals tomorrow!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm looking forward to more GB medals tomorrow!

auth_sentence.content: We'd hire them all tomorrow if we could.
auth_sentence.res_content: We'd hire them all tomorrow if we could.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We'd hire them all tomorrow if we could.

Sentence.sentence: Believe it or not, that's the number of Americans who struggle with hanger To make tomorrow a little better, Feeding America, the nation's largest domestic hunger-relief organization, has chosen September as Hunger Action Month.
Just this morning, I've been working extra hours all week, you know the building opens tomorrow
The problem is that tomorrow might not come.
A lot of cool stuff will be available online tomorrow.
Tomorrow we will transcend these as well, and the dreamers will deserve a lot of the credit.
Meanwhile, Europe has fallen prey to a different ideological trap: the belief that European governments would always have infinite resources and could continue borrowing as if there were no tomorrow.

sentences.en: Let me look at tomorrow's arrangements.
sentences.cn: 让我看一下明天的安排。

sentences.en: We put there for the night and set out on the tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们在那里住了一晚, 并于翌日动身。

sentences.en: The cars for tomorrow will be small, safe and very cheap.
sentences.cn: 未来的汽车小型、安全, 而且价格十分便宜。

jushi.english: I am positive that he will come to see us tomorrow.
jushi.chinese: 我确信他明天会来看我们。

jushi.english: Don't put off till tomorrow what should be done today.
They will have a meeting at 8 o'clock tomorrow morning.
jushi.chinese: 他们将于明天早上八点举行会议。
